item.title: 1 And Escape to Reality
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 1 And Escape to Reality 11 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, DO YOU HAVE A MESSAGE FOR SANNYASINS AND FRIENDS GATHERING AT THE CAFE ROYAL, LONDON, FOR THE “MARCH EVENT”? ANAND POONAM, SANNYAS IS A REBELLION against both the past and the future. Man has either lived in the past or in the future, but never in the present.

item.title: 10 The Dignity of the Poor?
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 10 The Dignity of the Poor? 20 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, THE LATEST FROM THE POPE: “DEFENDING THE HUMAN DIGNITY OF THE POOR AND THEIR HOPE FOR A HUMAN FUTURE IS NOT A LUXURY FOR THE CHURCH, NOR IS IT A STRATEGY OF OPPORTUNISM, NOR A MEANS FOR CURRYING FAVOR WITH THE MASSES. IT IS HER DUTY.

item.title: 11 No Higher, No Lower
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 11 No Higher, No Lower 21 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, “HOLIER-THAN-THOU” SEEMS TO BE MY LIFELONG MANTRA. GROWING UP AS A CATHOLIC, I THANKED GOD DAILY THAT I WAS A PART OF THE ONE TRUE RELIGION. AS A CATHOLIC NUN I KNEW I HAD “MADE IT”. NOW, AS A SANNYASIN, I OBSERVE THOSE SAME ATTITUDES AND JUDGMENTS HAPPENING AT EVERY TURN.

item.title: 12 Back to the Garden
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 12 Back to the Garden 22 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, CATHOLICISM, MOHAMMEDANISM, HINDUISM, JAINISM AND BUDDHISM, WHICH ARE THE MOST “RELIGIOUS” OF RELIGIONS, SEEM MOST CONCERNED ABOUT PURITY, CLEANLINESS AND SEXUAL ABSTINENCE. YET, THE PRESIDE OVER THE MOST UNHYGIENIC, MALNOURISHED AND MISERABLE PEOPLES OF THE EARTH. IS THERE A CONNECTION? DEVARAJ, THERE IS CERTAINLY AND ABSOLUTELY a tremendous connection.

item.title: 13 The Immediate is the Ultimate
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 13 The Immediate is the Ultimate 23 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, I AM NOT A SANNYASIN, AND I AM VISITING THE ASHRAM FOR A SHORT PERIOD. I APPRECIATE THE WORK THAT IS DONE HERE, BUT THERE IS ONE QUESTION THAT I CANNOT AVOID ASKING. THE THEORY IS NICE, BUT FROM THE DOZENS OF SANNYASINS WITH WHOM I HAVE SPOKEN, NOBODY COULD SAY, “I HAVE FOUND THE WAY, I AM PROCEEDING, AND I AM SURE ONE DAY I WILL BE ABLE TO STAND ON MY OWN FEET.

item.title: 14 The Bird has Flown
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌CHAPTER 14 The Bird has Flown 24 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, THE DUTCH TELEVISION HAS ASKED ME TO PARTICIPATE IN A PROGRAM. ONE OF THE QUESTIONS ON WHICH THEY WANT ME TO SPEAK IS AS FOLLOWS: WHAT IS LACKING IN THE CHRISTIAN CHURCHES THAT IS ATTRACTING SO MANY YOUNG PEOPLE TO THE NEW RELIGIOUS MOVEMENTS? DEVA OJAS, The christ is missing.

item.title: 2 Religion is Rebellion
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 2 Religion is Rebellion 12 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, I HAVE HEARD THAT THE GERMAN CHANCELLOR, HELMUT SCHMIDT, DECLARED ON TELEVISION THAT SANNYASINS WERE VERY DANGEROUS PEOPLE FOR THE STATE AND SOCIETY, AND SHOULD NOT BE ENGAGED FOR PUBLIC SERVICE OR BY RESPECTABLE COMPANIES ANY MORE. LOTS OF GERMANS ARE TELEVISION-WATCHERS AND BEHAVE ACCORDING TO WHAT THE POLITICIANS SAY.

item.title: 3 Ecstatic All the Way
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 3 Ecstatic All the Way 13 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, WOULD YOU PLEASE SAY SOMETHING ON THE FOLLOWING WORDS OF THE POET, KAHLIL GIBRAN: “WHEN LOVE BECKONS TO YOU, FOLLOW HIM. LOVE POSSESSES NOT NOR WOULD IT BE POSSESSED, FOR LOVE IS SUFFICIENT UNTO LOVE. LOVE HAS NO DESIRE BUT TO FULFILL ITSELF.” ANIL BHARTI,

item.title: 4 Soul-living by Loving
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 4 Soul-living by Loving 14 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, WHY IS HUGGING SUCH AN INCREDIBLY EFFECTIVE THERAPEUTIC TOOL? P.S. I USED TO THINK THAT CLARITY, WIT AND ANALYSIS WAS THE WAY, BUT THEY ARE ALL GARBAGE ALONGSIDE HUGGING. PREM AMIDA, MAN NEEDS TO BE NEEDED. It is one of the most fundamental needs of human beings.

item.title: 5 Pure Non-Zense
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 5 Pure Non-Zense 15 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, PLEASE TALK ABOUT THE ANTICHRIST AND TELL US WHAT IT COULD BE. I HAVE ALWAYS HEARD IT BEING COMMENTED UPON WITH GREAT FEAR AND WITH NO EXPLANATION. PEOPLE DON’T KNOW WHAT IT IS AND YET THEY FEAR IT. JOSEFINA, THE PRIEST HAS LIVED AS A PARASITE; he has been sucking people’s blood.

item.title: 6 Still Believing in Leprechauns?
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 6 Still Believing in Leprechauns? 16 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, EVERY TIME I’M AWAY FROM MY FAMILY I FEEL SUCH A DEEP AND BEAUTIFUL LOVE FOR MY WIFE AND MY CHILDREN. BUT WHEN I AM WITH THEM, LOTS OF CONFLICTS ARISE AND I FEEL LIKE RUNNING AWAY FROM FAMILY, JOB, TRADITION, ET CETERA. BUT WHEN I’M AWAY I FEEL THAT’S NOT IT – THAT’S NOT THE ANSWER.

item.title: 7 Life\'s Complementariness
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 7 Life’s Complementariness 17 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, YOU OFTEN ADVISE US TO FOLLOW TWO COURSES OF ACTION THAT SEEM TO BE INCOMPATIBLE WITH EACH OTHER. FIRST YOU TELL US TO BE COMPLETELY IN THE MOMENT, WITHOUT MIND, TO BE OUR FEAR, OUR JOY, OR RAGE. THEN YOU TELL US TO BECOME DETACHED FROM OUR EGOS, TO WATCH WHAT COMES UP WITHIN OURSELVES.

item.title: 8 When Ignorance Becomes Luminous
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 8 When Ignorance Becomes Luminous 18 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, WHAT MADE A LOVING DISCIPLE LIKE PETER, WHO STARTED FROM INNOCENCE, TURN INTO THE CUNNING FIRST POPE AND BECOME THE FOUNDER OF CHRISTIANITY? IS IT POSSIBLE TO LOSE ONE’S INNOCENCE ONCE THE LOVE RELATIONSHIP WITH THE MASTER IS ESTABLISHED? ANAND NADO, THERE ARE MANY THINGS to be understood.

item.title: 9 Bon Voyage Baby!
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌CHAPTER 9 Bon Voyage Baby! 19 February 1981 am in Buddha Hall The first question: Question 1 OSHO, A FEW MONTHS AGO IN THE WEST I READ A BOOK BY LAMA TRUNGPA, ENTITLED “CUTTING THROUGH SPIRITUAL MATERIALISM”, AND I GOT THE IMPRESSION THAT EVERYTHING THAT COULD BE DONE WRONG, I WAS DOING. THEN I TRIED TO BE MORE ALERT, BUT BY VOIDING ONE PITFALL I WAS CONSTANTLY STEPPING INTO ANOTHER, AND SO ON.
